skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Double Whammy
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. 

Removes 1 random debuff from all allies before attacking. Damage increases by 5% for each debuff removed.
skills.name: Vigor Explosion
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. 

Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Wall of Muscle

skills.desc: Whenever this Champion is attacked, has a 20% chance of decreasing the duration of all debuffs on this Champion by 1 turn.
skills.name: Shrug Off [P]
